title: Matrices and Determinants
quote: Dive into the fundamentals of matrices and determinants with this quiz.

questions.question: 01. What is the determinant of a 2x2 matrix [[a, b], [c, d]]?
02. What is the identity matrix for a 2x2 matrix?
03. What is the transpose of matrix [[1, 2], [3, 4]]?
04. What is the rank of a zero matrix?
05. If A is a square matrix, what is |kA| (determinant of k times A)?
questions.answer: kⁿ|A|, where n is the order of A
